A time traveler goes back in time to prevent a tragic event, but ends up changing the course of history in unforeseen ways.
A group of strangers find themselves stranded on a deserted island with no memory of how they got there or why they were brought together.
A person discovers a mysterious, ancient artifact that grants them supernatural powers, but at a terrible cost.
A person is forced to confront their deepest fears and insecurities when they are trapped in a room with no way out.
A person discovers that their entire life has been a carefully crafted illusion,led by a powerful entity that has been manipulating their every move.
